feed.title: Miklb’s Mindless Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Chronicling life in a digital world. Touching on web dev, food, and a little of everything in between.

entry.content: If I ever open a beach bar, I’m going to call it “Shelter in Place"
entry.summary: If I ever open a beach bar, I’m going to call it “Shelter in Place"

entry.content: Reading @TropicalTidbits and thinking about hand tracking storms as a kid on a little map from NHC given out at grocery stores
entry.summary: Reading @TropicalTidbits and thinking about hand tracking storms as a kid on a little map from NHC given out at grocery stores

entry.content: Mock stickers in Messages all you want, but I just started playing chess again through it and it’s bloody brilliant.
entry.summary: Mock stickers in Messages all you want, but I just started playing chess again through it and it’s bloody brilliant.

entry.content: Guess I’m dusting off my rusty js skills this week to incorporate selectize with CMB2 unless @Jtsternberg knows of an implementation already
entry.summary: Guess I’m dusting off my rusty js skills this week to incorporate selectize with CMB2 unless @Jtsternberg knows of an implementation already

entry.content: Two different code editors, both using phpcs, supposedly using same standards, giving different results. Shouldn’t be this difficult.
entry.summary: Two different code editors, both using phpcs, supposedly using same standards, giving different results. Shouldn’t be this difficult.

entry.content: Between all the geckos and now little frogs my back porch is like a Herpetarium. And it’s awesome.
entry.summary: Between all the geckos and now little frogs my back porch is like a Herpetarium. And it’s awesome.

entry.content: Any macOS app I’ve touched that uses Electron as foundation is completely hosed in my dev environment. Atom/VS Code and beta Slack so far.
entry.summary: Any macOS app I’ve touched that uses Electron as foundation is completely hosed in my dev environment. Atom/VS Code and beta Slack so far.

entry.content: I hope to live to see the day @AtomEditor doesn’t throw an “Editor is not responding” when I try to close a window.
entry.summary: I hope to live to see the day @AtomEditor doesn’t throw an “Editor is not responding” when I try to close a window.

entry.content: Leaving this here for future reference. Turn on debug menu in Mac App Store `defaults write com.apple.appstore ShowDebugMenu -bool true`
entry.summary: Leaving this here for future reference. Turn on debug menu in Mac App Store `defaults write com.apple.appstore ShowDebugMenu -bool true`
